testcase.name: Docs sections should contains appropriate columns
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens Onliner website........................................passed When the user clicks on the "Каталог" section...............................passed And the user clicks on the "Дом и сад" classification.......................passed And the user clicks on the "Садовая техника и инструменты" category.........passed And the user clicks on the "Триммеры" product...............................passed And the user clicks on the product item.....................................passed And the user confirms the city..............................................passed And the user adds item to cart..............................................passed Then cart with product is displayed.........................................passed
